issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Lester discovered this:

  
Btw, I've tested on a 3.0.1 cloud by creating a snapshot as the

eucalyptus/admin user, then moving to a different user in another account with

an "allow everything" policy. As the other user I am unable to list

eucalyptus/admin snapshots but if I run a create-volume --snapshot
<snapshotID>

I'm still able to create an EBS volume from eucalyptus/admin's snapshot. I

don't think this is intended behaviour, unless we have some partial

implementation here:

  
euare-usergetattributes arn:aws:iam::eucalyptus:user/admin

GS1DMW4T0KEOEFIX78YJO euca-create-volume -z jeevan-cluster -s 2 VOLUME

vol-B6743A06 2 jeevan-cluster creating 2012-04-26T08:57:04.905Z

euca-create-snapshot vol-B6743A06 SNAPSHOT snap-817040C8 vol-B6743A06 pending

2012-04-26T08:57:45.438Z 0% None euca-describe-snapshots SNAPSHOT
snap-C3214047

vol-91363F8D completed 2012-04-26T08:47:24Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-BB644132

vol-D3DB40F8 completed 2012-04-24T07:29:09Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-44FC4043

vol-77E44263 completed 2012-04-24T06:09:02Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-DBD03B26

vol-77E44263 completed 2012-04-24T04:49:02Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-95E6435B

vol-D3DB40F8 completed 2012-04-24T09:16:37Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-D2E83C6F

vol-D3DB40F8 completed 2012-04-24T05:53:08Z 100%SNAPSHOT snap-817040C8

vol-B6743A06 completed 2012-04-26T08:57:45Z 100%

cd lester source eucarc euare-usergetattributes arn:aws:iam::lester:user/bob

CDJLTHNRP3KSUPFDQ2YXQ

euca-describe-snapshots (nothing seen here) euca-create-volume -z

jeevan-cluster --snapshot snap-817040C8 VOLUME vol-A1383E02 snap-817040C8

jeevan-cluster creating 2012-04-26T08:59:31.797Z euca-describe-volumes VOLUME

vol-B29B404D 3 snap-C3214047 jeevan-cluster available
2012-04-26T08:51:20ZVOLUME

vol-A1383E02 2 snap-817040C8 jeevan-cluster available 2012-04-26T08:59:31Z so
I

think we can achieve this currently but maybe not intentionally :S
fields.summary: EBS: snapshot is not protected by permission checking in CreateVolume

comments.body:
Originally posted on 2012-04-26 16:30:22 by wenye

Thu Apr 26 09:30:21 2012: Request 8385 was acted upon.
 Transaction: Ticket created by wen.ye
       Queue: Engineering Bugs
     Subject: EBS: snapshot is not protected by permission checking in CreateVolume
       Owner: Nobody
  Requestors: wenye@eucalyptus.com
      Status: new
 Ticket <URL: https://support.eucalyptus.com/Ticket/Display.html?id=8385 >


Lester discovered this:

Btw, I've tested on a 3.0.1 cloud by creating a snapshot as the
eucalyptus/admin user, then moving to a different user in another account with
an "allow everything" policy. As the other user I am unable to list
eucalyptus/admin snapshots but if I run a create-volume --snapshot <snapshotID>
I'm still able to create an EBS volume from eucalyptus/admin's snapshot. I
don't think this is intended behaviour, unless we have some partial
implementation here:

euare-usergetattributes arn:aws:iam::eucalyptus:user/admin
GS1DMW4T0KEOEFIX78YJO euca-create-volume -z jeevan-cluster -s 2 VOLUME
vol-B6743A06 2 jeevan-cluster creating 2012-04-26T08:57:04.905Z
euca-create-snapshot vol-B6743A06 SNAPSHOT snap-817040C8 vol-B6743A06 pending
2012-04-26T08:57:45.438Z 0% None euca-describe-snapshots SNAPSHOT snap-C3214047
vol-91363F8D completed 2012-04-26T08:47:24Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-BB644132
vol-D3DB40F8 completed 2012-04-24T07:29:09Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-44FC4043
vol-77E44263 completed 2012-04-24T06:09:02Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-DBD03B26
vol-77E44263 completed 2012-04-24T04:49:02Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-95E6435B
vol-D3DB40F8 completed 2012-04-24T09:16:37Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-D2E83C6F
vol-D3DB40F8 completed 2012-04-24T05:53:08Z 100%SNAPSHOT snap-817040C8
vol-B6743A06 completed 2012-04-26T08:57:45Z 100%
cd lester source eucarc euare-usergetattributes arn:aws:iam::lester:user/bob
CDJLTHNRP3KSUPFDQ2YXQ
euca-describe-snapshots (nothing seen here) euca-create-volume -z
jeevan-cluster --snapshot snap-817040C8 VOLUME vol-A1383E02 snap-817040C8
jeevan-cluster creating 2012-04-26T08:59:31.797Z euca-describe-volumes VOLUME
vol-B29B404D 3 snap-C3214047 jeevan-cluster available
2012-04-26T08:51:20ZVOLUME
vol-A1383E02 2 snap-817040C8 jeevan-cluster available 2012-04-26T08:59:31Z so I
think we can achieve this currently but maybe not intentionally :S

Originally posted on 2012-04-26 21:44:02 by nurmi

Thu Apr 26 14:44:02 2012: Request 8385 was acted upon.
 Transaction: Given to wen.ye by dan.nurmi
       Queue: Engineering Bugs
     Subject: EBS: snapshot is not protected by permission checking in CreateVolume
       Owner: wen.ye
  Requestors: wenye@eucalyptus.com
      Status: new
 Ticket <URL: https://support.eucalyptus.com/Ticket/Display.html?id=8385 >


This transaction appears to have no content

Originally posted on 2012-04-28 03:18:14 by wenye
Fixed in git master

  

commit dc736a3512250b04bc86dee97837658be2b93a28

Author: Ye Wen <wenye@eucalyptus.com>

Date:  Thu Apr 26 12:06:09 2012 -0700

EC2/EBS: Add permission check for snapshot in CreateVolume.

On Thu Apr 26 09:30:21 2012, wen.ye wrote:

> Lester discovered this:

>

> Btw, I've tested on a 3.0.1 cloud by creating a snapshot as the

> eucalyptus/admin user, then moving to a different user in another

> account with

> an "allow everything" policy. As the other user I am unable to list

> eucalyptus/admin snapshots but if I run a create-volume --snapshot

> <snapshotID>

> I'm still able to create an EBS volume from eucalyptus/admin's

> snapshot. I

> don't think this is intended behaviour, unless we have some partial

> implementation here:

>

> euare-usergetattributes arn:aws:iam::eucalyptus:user/admin

> GS1DMW4T0KEOEFIX78YJO euca-create-volume -z jeevan-cluster -s 2 VOLUME

> vol-B6743A06 2 jeevan-cluster creating 2012-04-26T08:57:04.905Z

> euca-create-snapshot vol-B6743A06 SNAPSHOT snap-817040C8 vol-B6743A06

> pending

> 2012-04-26T08:57:45.438Z 0% None euca-describe-snapshots SNAPSHOT

> snap-C3214047

> vol-91363F8D completed 2012-04-26T08:47:24Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-

> BB644132

> vol-D3DB40F8 completed 2012-04-24T07:29:09Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-

> 44FC4043

> vol-77E44263 completed 2012-04-24T06:09:02Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-

> DBD03B26

> vol-77E44263 completed 2012-04-24T04:49:02Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-

> 95E6435B

> vol-D3DB40F8 completed 2012-04-24T09:16:37Z 100% SNAPSHOT snap-

> D2E83C6F

> vol-D3DB40F8 completed 2012-04-24T05:53:08Z 100%SNAPSHOT snap-817040C8

> vol-B6743A06 completed 2012-04-26T08:57:45Z 100%

> cd lester source eucarc euare-usergetattributes

> arn:aws:iam::lester:user/bob

> CDJLTHNRP3KSUPFDQ2YXQ

> euca-describe-snapshots (nothing seen here) euca-create-volume -z

> jeevan-cluster --snapshot snap-817040C8 VOLUME vol-A1383E02 snap-

> 817040C8

> jeevan-cluster creating 2012-04-26T08:59:31.797Z euca-describe-volumes

> VOLUME

> vol-B29B404D 3 snap-C3214047 jeevan-cluster available

> 2012-04-26T08:51:20ZVOLUME

> vol-A1383E02 2 snap-817040C8 jeevan-cluster available 2012-04-

> 26T08:59:31Z so I

> think we can achieve this currently but maybe not intentionally :S

Originally posted on 2012-04-28 03:18:20 by wenye

<URL: https://support.eucalyptus.com/Ticket/Display.html?id=8385 >

Fixed in git master
